shortDescription: The Netflix Clone is a stylish web application that mimics the layout and functionality of the Netflix platform. Designed to showcase featured content like Stranger Things, it allows users to browse shows, see ratings, and explore episodes. The interface focuses on a cinematic design experience with responsive layout and smooth navigation.
